markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Holomog](/Articles.aspx?ID=68)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 68</row>

The celestial matriarchy of Holomog is Geb's large and powerful neighbor to the south. The land is protected by angels but simmers with intrigue and adventure!
name: Holomog
